subject: RE: [junit] How can I get Junit Test to run in parallel threads?
msgSnippet: ... You might want to check out JUnitPerf by Mike Clark (www.clarkware.com/software/JUnitPerf.html} Dave -- Dave Astels (dave@saorsa.com) Coauthor of A
messageBody:
On Wed, 2002-10-02 at 13:07, Tambascio, Larry wrote:
> Hey Rob in NYC,
>
> Check out ActiveTestSuite in the documentation. It's a test suite where
> each test is run in a separate thread. I've done that before, but don't
> expect too much in the way of performance metrics. You'll definitely find
> out if you have any problems like choking and dying, though.

You might want to check out JUnitPerf by Mike Clark
(www.clarkware.com/software/JUnitPerf.html}

Dave
--
Dave Astels (dave@...)
Coauthor of "A Practical Guide to XP"
Editor of the Test-Driven Development Edition of The Coad Letter
(subscribe at www.thecoadletter.com)
CEO & Master Software Craftsman, Saorsa Development Inc.
www.saorsa.com
"An Agile Software Studio"
